channel.title: The BattleHammer of Ouch
channel.description:
I got bored so I decided to make a hammer. Love it, Hate it, You decide.
Didn't do too much with the handle. Just a basic one. Most of the stuff was done one the hitty part lol.
Hammer... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/TheBattleHammerofOuch.jpg[/img]
WireFrame... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/TheBattleHammerofOuchWireFrame.jpg[/img]
Wielded... [IMG]http://i562.photobucket.com/albums/ss67/killernoob3/TheBattleHammerofOuchwielded.jpg[/img]

item.title: The BattleHammer of Ouch
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“brandonscarinfo, post:24, topic:356724”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=453257.msg3460087#msg3460087 date=1294403936]

Looks like you stabbed half a dragon mace with a vesta’s longsword xD

AGREED MAN!!! LOL

AGREED lol
@ontopic
i do however like the idea of this, maybe give it a real shot, i would love to see where this idea lands

You’re pretty stupid giving constructive criticism to a project that’s obviously been dead.
[/quote]

seriously dont hate the new guy (me). was giving constructive criticism because maybe he was still working on it…[/quote]
sorry, was in a bad mood at the time :o

item.title: The BattleHammer of Ouch

item.description:

[quote=“Cowarooroo, post:7, topic:356724”][quote author=Orngequirrel link=topic=453257.msg3321860#msg3321860 date=1282774177]
i dont like it, sorry to say, but the “head” of it is just a sphere where you fucked up the vertices and made it randomly spiky all over, and the handle is a square stick
[/quote]
How are they “fucked up”. I just pulled some out and made a little twisty motion around the middle one.[/quote]
because the spikes random and look like they were done in about 30 seconds.

Read full topic
